statements: UPDATE exercise_plans SET duration_in_weeks = 10 WHERE plan_id = 1;
UPDATE exercise_plans SET goal_name = 'Weight Loss' WHERE plan_id = 2;
UPDATE exercise_plans SET plan_description = 'Includes cardio and strength training' WHERE plan_id = 3;

UPDATE exercise_plans SET goal_name = 'Weight Loss', plan_description = 'This plan focuses on losing weight through a combination of cardiovascular and strength training exercises.', duration_in_weeks = 12, exercises = '{"cardio":["Running", "Cycling"], "strength":["Squats", "Deadlifts"]}' WHERE plan_id = 1;

UPDATE exercise_plans SET goal_name = 'Muscle Building', plan_description = 'This plan is designed to help individuals build muscle mass and increase strength using high-intensity resistance training.', duration_in_weeks = 16, exercises = '{"upper_body":["Bench Press", "Pull-ups"], "lower_body":["Squats", "Lunges"]}' WHERE plan_id = 2;

UPDATE exercise_plans SET goal_name = 'Flexibility and Mobility', plan_description = 'A flexible plan that focuses on improving overall flexibility and mobility through a combination of stretching and mobility exercises.', duration_in_weeks = 8, exercises = '{"stretching":["Yoga Poses", "Pilates"], "mobility":["Foam Rolling", "Joint Rotations"]}' WHERE plan_id = 3;
